name: AI LIN NGO
what_you_do: Uplify is an AI-powered behavior-change platform that helps service-based business owners grow, get profitable, and get paid what they deserve.
signature_programs: Lina AI Business Coach, Uplify System
service_provided: AI business coaching, business strategy guidance, sales call practice, template creation, email scripts, proposals, step-by-step business plans
social_proof: Kateryna Quinn is an award-winning marketing agency founder featured in Forbes NEXT 1000 and NOCO 30 Under 30.
bio: Ai Lin Ngo is associated with Uplify, an AI-powered business coaching platform. Uplify offers an AI business coach named Lina that provides 24/7 business strategy guidance to service-based business owners. The platform is trained on proven strategies that have helped thousands of service businesses grow.
business_focus: Providing AI-powered business coaching and behavior-change tools to help service-based business owners increase profitability and growth.
offering: AI business coaching through their platform (Lina AI Business Coach), step-by-step business plans, sales call practice, templates, email scripts, and proposals.
